title: Beta Untamed
description: Asher is determined to never settle down—until he meets his mate.Asher is a flirt and the fun-loving joker of the Pack. He’s determined to remain single forever, but that plan goes out the window when Valencia arrives.A feisty human, she teases him at every turn. Makes him want something more. Especially after they spend a weekend as a pretend couple to avoid trouble with his old Pack.Problem is he’s got a secret, a howling and hairy one. And she's mentioned more than once the fact that she’s not crazy about dogs.Things come to a head when Valencia is threatened and he’s forced to show her his feral side. Will she run or stay to tame the beast?
author: Eve Langlais
